cmp: 台 (surname/(classical) you (in letters)/platform/Taiwan (abbr.), desk/platform, (measure word)/platform/stage/terrace/stand/support/desk/station/broadcasting station, typhoon)

exm.mng: lit. heart untroubled, spirit pleased (idiom); carefree and relaxed
Zhang Yining (1981-), PRC female table tennis player and Olympic gold medalist
Ipoh city in Malaysia, capital of Sultanate of Perak on Malayan peninsula
Zhang Yi (1608-1695), prolific author and poet spanning interregnum between Ming and Qing
